Making Tables Accessible

Adding Alt Text for Tables
Grayscale Colours

Microsoft PowerPoint

Adding Alt Text to Tables

Ensures that tables contain text descriptions that can be read by a screen reader to help visually impaired students

    Step 1: Right click on the table and select "Edit Alt Text"



    Step 2: Type 1-2 sentences to describe the table

Grayscale Table Colour

Ensures that the chosen table structure uses minimal colour to accomodate for colour blindness and to reduce distraction

    Step 1: Select the Insert tab, click table, and choose the number of rows and columns you desire



    Step 2: Select the Table, click the design tab, and choose a table design with no colours

Microsoft Word

Adding Alt Text to Tables

Ensures that tables contain text descriptions that can be read by a screen reader to help visually impaired students

    Step 2: Type 1-2 sentences to describe the table
